column4: I cant believe smething as simple as wanting to mount a HD can cause this much trouble
you mean clicking on an icon? :P
well ubuntu too.  Do you have a question?
I have a minimal install and installed pysdm to mount my drives. Now I get this error An error occurred while mounting /media/sdc1
what do you want to accomplish?  Add sdc1 to your fstab?
I still get the error after uninstalling pysdm
i just want to get rid of the error before i backup
it's information I need to help you figure out what is going on
I was confused here is the info http://pastebin.com/73vw9UDX
open fstab with your favorite text editor
